name: TheNightfall
description: Victoria moves with her family to a new city to start her new job. But the first night in her new house is completely different than expected.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7+ 64bit Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo / AMD® Athlon™ X2, min. 2.8 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia® / AMD® with 2048 MB memory DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7+ 64bit Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Quad / AMD® Phenom™ X4, min. 3,4 GHz Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia® / AMD® with 4096 MB memory DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible
